price: Kuma daga mutãnen* Mũsã akwai al'umma, sunã shiryarwa da gaskiya, kuma da ita suke yin ãdalci.
arabic: وَمِن قَوۡمِ مُوسَىٰٓ أُمَّةٞ يَهۡدُونَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِهِۦ يَعۡدِلُونَ
footnotes: * Anã nũna cewa duka yadda mutãne suka ɓãci, bã zã a rasa na kirki a cikin su ba.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamin qawmi mūsā ummatun yahdūna bil-ḥaqi wabihi yaʿdilūna
